description: Monitor of the open available Data from the ENTSOG

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  sum(actual_load/($__interval_ms/1000/3600)) AS "actual_load"
FROM entsoe.query_load
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country IN ('DE','AT','FR','PL','IT','ES','PT','CH','BE','NL','GB','SE','NO')
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  sum(forecasted_load/($__interval_ms/1000/3600)) AS "forecasted_load"
FROM entsoe.query_load_forecast
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country IN ('DE','AT','FR','PL','IT','ES','PT','CH','BE','NL','GB','SE','NO')
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  sum((biomass+
  fossil_hard_coal+
  geothermal+
  nuclear+
  "fossil_brown_coal/lignite"+
  "fossil_coal-derived_gas"+
  "hydro_run-of-river_and_poundage"+
  waste+
  solar+
  wind_offshore+
  wind_onshore+
  other_renewable+
  hydro_water_reservoir+
  fossil_gas)
  /($__interval_ms/1000/3600)) AS "generation_sum"
FROM entsoe.query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  sum(actual_aggregated/10) AS "forecasted_generation",
  sum(actual_consumption) AS "forecasted_consumption"
FROM entsoe.query_generation_forecast
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  0 AS "time",
  lat,
  lon,
  capacity,
  country,
  energy_source
FROM entsoe.powersystemdata
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  country AS metric,
  avg("0") AS """0"""
FROM entsoe.query_day_ahead_prices
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg(actual_load) AS "actual_load"
FROM entsoe.query_load
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg(forecasted_load) AS "forecasted_load"
FROM entsoe.query_load_forecast
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  index AS "time",
  biomass,
  fossil_hard_coal,
  geothermal,
  nuclear,
  "fossil_brown_coal/lignite",
  "fossil_coal-derived_gas",
  "hydro_run-of-river_and_poundage",
  waste,
  solar,
  wind_offshore,
  wind_onshore,
  other_renewable
FROM entsoe.query_installed_generation_capacity
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("index",$__interval),
  avg(biomass) as biomass,
  avg(fossil_hard_coal) as fossil_hard_coal,
  avg(geothermal) as geothermal,
  avg(nuclear) as nuclear,
  avg("fossil_brown_coal/lignite") as "fossil_brown_coal/lignite",
  avg("fossil_coal-derived_gas") as "fossil_coal-derived_gas",
  avg("hydro_run-of-river_and_poundage") as "hydro_run-of-river_and_poundage",
  avg(waste) as waste,
  avg(solar) as solar,
  avg(wind_offshore) as wind_offshore,
  avg(wind_onshore) as wind_onshore,
  avg(other_renewable) as other_renewable,
  avg(hydro_water_reservoir) as hydro_water_reservoir,
  avg(fossil_gas) as fossil_gas
FROM entsoe.query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country'
group by 1
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg("0") AS "da_price"
FROM entsoe.query_day_ahead_prices
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  sum(solar/($__interval_ms/1000/3600)) AS "solar_fc",
  sum(wind_onshore/($__interval_ms/1000/3600)) AS "wind_onshore_fc",
  sum(wind_offshore/($__interval_ms/1000/3600)) AS "wind_offshore_fc"
FROM entsoe.query_wind_and_solar_forecast
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  sum(solar/($__interval_ms/1000/3600)) AS "solar",
  sum(wind_onshore/($__interval_ms/1000/3600)) AS "wind_onshore",
  sum(wind_offshore/($__interval_ms/1000/3600)) AS "wind_offshore"
FROM entsoe.query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Compare RES forecast - with actual (average over ${__interval})

title: ENTSOE-Monitor
